title: Houdini
author: Dua Lipa
lyrics:
[00:02.84] Okay, huh, mm, ah
[00:10.61] 
[00:20.45] I come and I go
[00:22.86] Tell me all the ways you need me
[00:25.39] I'm not here for long
[00:27.19] Catch me or I go Houdini
[00:29.41] I come and I go
[00:31.50] Prove you got the right to please me
[00:33.37] Everybody knows
[00:35.04] Catch me or I go Houdini
[00:37.99] Time is passin' like a solar eclipse
[00:41.69] See you watchin' and you blow me a kiss
[00:45.34] It's your moment, baby, don't let it slip
[00:49.50] Come in closer, are you readin' my lips?
[00:53.27] They say I come and I go
[00:55.29] Tell me all the ways you need me
[00:57.58] I'm not here for long
[00:59.79] Catch me or I go Houdini
[01:02.05] I come and I go
[01:03.71] Prove you got the right to please me
[01:06.11] Everybody knows
[01:07.79] Catch me or I go Houdini
[01:10.12] If you're good enough, you'll find a way
[01:14.43] Maybe you could cause a girl to change (her ways)
[01:18.90] Do you think about it night and day?
[01:22.13] Maybe you could be the one to make me stay
[01:27.45] Everything you say is soundin' so sweet (ah-ah)
[01:30.51] But do you practise everything that you preach? (Ah-ah)
[01:34.93] I need something that'll make me believe (ah-ah)
[01:38.42] If you got it, baby, give it to me
[01:42.36] They say I come and I go
[01:44.93] Tell me all the ways you need me
[01:46.76] I'm not here for long
[01:49.01] Catch me or I go Houdini
[01:51.19] I come and I go (I come and I go)
[01:53.25] Prove you got the right to please me
[01:55.28] Everybody knows (I'm not here for long)
[01:57.09] Catch me or I go Houdini
[01:59.66] If you're good enough, you'll find a way
[02:03.55] Maybe you could cause a girl to change (her ways)
[02:07.74] Do you think about it night and day?
[02:11.65] Maybe you could be the one to make me stay
[02:18.24] Oh-oh
[02:24.38] Ooh
[02:28.05] 
[02:32.74] I come and I go
[02:34.81] Tell me all the ways you need me (ooh)
[02:36.27] I'm not here for long
[02:38.42] Catch me or I go Houdini
[02:40.53] I come and I go (I come and I go)
[02:42.84] Prove you got the right to please me
[02:45.16] Everybody knows (I'm not here for long)
[02:46.08] Catch me or I go Houdini
[02:49.31] 
[02:55.40] Houdini
[02:58.39] 
[03:01.38] Catch me or I go Houdini
[03:02.45]
